name: A Midwinter Carol
description:
A Midwinter Carol.

This was made as a school project inside Twine engine. As this engine is small and nice for text based adventures, and since I like Fighting Fantasy as an offline single player RPG I decided to combine both.

This story is written by Kieran Coghlan and I would like to thank him to give me permission to use his story. Characters and locations are created by Robin Waterford.

Fighting Fantasy.

The Fighting Fantasy rules are not my own, these are developed by Steve Jackson and Ian Livingstone. If you like this little adventure I hope you check out Fighting Fantasy as they have many great adventures for your character to play.

known issues.

The game starts with a pop up. If you fill in a name for your character this name will be used trough the adventure. Currently I haven't found any better way to do this.
